alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 10:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ECHOLS...SOUTH CENTRAL WARE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINCH COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1002 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fargo, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
